Disclaimer SightUP does not replace professional eye exams. Always consult with a licensed eye care provider for accurate diagnosis and prescription needs. Let's Get Started
Checkup Daily Eye Condition Monitor your eye health daily with quick assessments to detect potential issues early. Vision Tests Conduct convenient vision tests to track changes in eyesight without needing a clinic visit. Vision History Tracker Keep a record of your vision status over time, including naked eye, glasses, and contact lens use. We will guide you using motion and sound. Remember to keep your head still and let your eyes do the work.. Blink slowly and gently to avoid eye fatique. It helps to boost your visual processing speed and sharpen color perception. Try looking at a distant object for 20 seconds every 20 minutes to give your eyes a break.
Select Mode Choose the mode that suits you. Mode options will appear during the test and can be changed at any time.
